entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
